settings.passed_text:
Items with this label are tested, inspected, cleaned, and found to be working with no significant flaws, or: require a visual inspection only due to their mechanical simplicity.

These items can be considered “ready to use”. Repair, refurbishments, or upgrades may have been performed on these items by our in-house experts. Minor flaws are possible and are noted in the product description.

settings.not_passed_text:
Items with this label are untested or: tested, inspected, and found to have significant flaws that affect or prevent normal use. These items should be considered defective. Repair may or may not be possible.

These are best purchased as display pieces, spare parts, or for DIY/educational purposes. They may possibly be used as-is, taking into account the defects. Item-specific information is present in product descriptions when necessary.
